featured.text: The hard hat was invented in 1919 by Edward W. Bullard, who had just returned from World War I. Before the war, workers used to smear their hats with coal tar for protection of their head.

definition.zh_def: 煤炭，一種由植物殘骸經過長時間地質作用形成的黑色或棕色固體燃料。
definition.en_def: A black or brownish-black solid fossil fuel formed from the remains of ancient plants, used primarily for energy production.
definition.example: The power plant relies on coal to generate electricity.
